site_name: Hunters Chase Estate, Land At Swan Drive, Shellduck Close And Wagtail Close, Rear Of Properties In Booth Road, London, NW9
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Hybrid Black Poplar (applicants ref. T21) - Reduce back to previous points and remove epicormic growth. Standing in T4 of Tree Preservation Order.9 x Hybrid Black Poplar (applicants ref. T22, T23, T45, T46, T47, T48, T50, T70, T71) - Reduce back to previous points, remove deadwood and remove epicormic growth. Standing in Group G14 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Hybrid Black Poplar (applicants ref. T49) - Fell and grind stump. Standing in Group G14 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Hybrid Black Poplar (applicants ref. T52) - Reduce height by 4m and sides back to previous points remove deadwood and epicormic from trunk. Standing in Group G14 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Hybrid Black Poplar (applicants ref. T53) - Reduce crown down by approx. 6m, leaving finished height of approx. 16m and reduce sides to match into new crown height, form a smaller more compact tree. Standing in Group G14 of Tree Preservation Order.
